entry.para: The IT Resource used to establish the connection to the Source System.
Example value: VMOIM12c
The IT Resource used to establish the connection to the Target System.
Example value: VMOIM12c-target
Specifies the Entitlement search base to retrieve entries from the Source system.
Example value: ou=Funktionsrechte,ou=Anwendung3,ou=P20-Anwendungen,ou=P20,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the Organization search base to retrieve entries from the Source system.
Example value: ou=TN-Orgs,ou=P20,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the Role search base to retrieve entries from the Source system.
Example value: ou=Rollen,ou=Anwendung3,ou=P20-Anwendungen,ou=P20,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the Special Role search base to retrieve entries from the Source system.
Example value: ou=Marker,ou=Rollen,ou=Anwendung3,ou=P20-Anwendungen,ou=P20,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the Intermediate search base to retrieve entries from the Target system.
Example value: ou=Intermediate,ou=Anwendung3,ou=P20-Anwendungen,ou=P20,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the entitlement search base to retrieve entries from the Target system.
Example value: OU=Funktionsrechte,OU=PLX,OU=Applikationen,OU=TN1-PLX,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the Organization search base to retrieve entries from the Target system.
Example value: OU=Poliks Test,OU=TN1-PLX,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the Role search base to retrieve entries from the Target system.
Example value: OU=PLX,OU=Applikationen,OU=TN1-PLX,dc=example,dc=org
Specifies the Special Role search base to retrieve entries from the Source system.
Example value: OU=Marker,OU=PLX,OU=Applikationen,OU=TN1-PLX,dc=example,dc=org
MDS path to Group descriptor, holding attribute mapping between source and target group object classes.
Example value: /metadata/bka-features-synchronization/sync-group-descriptor.xml
MDS path to OrganizationalUnit descriptor, holding attribute mapping between source and target OrganizationalUnit object classes.
Example value: /metadata/bka-features-synchronization/sync-ou-descriptor.xml
Specifies the size of a block read from the reading source.
Example value: 100
